document.full_text: the true finns, the anti-euro party voted into a powerful role in the helsinki parliament at the weekend, expect the european union to change plans for a bailout of portugal, its leader said on monday.
document.title: true finns set for government, see eu bailout changes
lines_and_colors: the true finns, the anti-euro party voted into a powerful role in the helsinki parliament at the weekend, expect the european union to change plans for a bailout of portugal, its leader said on monday.
